text: maranam atainta oruvanai nam uyirppittu eluppinom - innum avanukku or oliyaiyum kotuttom. Ataikkontu avan manitarkalitaiye natamatukiran. Marroruvan irulkalil cikkikkitakkiran; ataivittu avan veliyerave mutiyatu - ivviruvarum camamavara? Ivvaru kahpirkalukku avarkal ceyyakkutiya (pavac)ceyalkal alakakkappattullana
